messages.subject: Fw: [nihonto] New Samurai Archives online forum community
messages.msgSnippet: Dear Blokes - FYI from another list. Regards, Barry Thomas. ... From: Kitsuno  To:  Sent: Sunday, May
messages.messageBody:
Dear Blokes - FYI from another list.

Regards,

Barry Thomas.

----- Original Message -----
From: "Kitsuno" <cewest@...>
To: <nihonto@yahoogroups.com>
Sent: Sunday, May 07, 2006 6:53 PM
Subject: [nihonto] New Samurai Archives online forum community


The Samurai Archives has a new online community - I'm pretty sure some
of you here are already on the new forum (and I hope no one minds me
posting here) but I'm sure there would be some interest here among
members who haven't seen it yet:

http://samurai.threespursdesign.com/index.php

The Samurai Archives Citadel is a collection of about 13 forums in 3
"locations" including forums for Japanese Samurai history, arms and
armor, language, culture, and martial arts. I invite everyone over to
take a look. It is new and I'm still tweaking it, but it is ready for
the initial kick off.

Thanks, and see you there!
